entry.title: Rockstone XR1 3.5mm Hi-Fi Stereo Earbuds
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rockstone
Type: Wired Headset
Price: 9.99

Unlike traditional, circular earbuds, the design of the XR1 is defined by the geometry of the ear. Which makes them more comfortable for more people than any other earbud-style headphones. Made with aircraft aluminium to stand the test of time.

The speakers inside the XR1 have been engineered to maximize sound output and minimize sound loss, which means you get high-quality audio.

The XR1 also include a built-in remote that lets you adjust the volume, control the playback of music and video, and answer or end calls with a touch of the cord.

entry.title: Rockstone XR1 Lightning Hi-Fi Stereo Earbuds
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rockstone
Type: Wired Headset
Price: 17.99

Unlike traditional, circular earbuds, the design of the XR1 is defined by the geometry of the ear. Which makes them more comfortable for more people than any other earbud-style headphones. Made with aircraft aluminium to stand the test of time.

The speakers inside the XR1 have been engineered to maximize sound output and minimize sound loss. Using the digital lightening port optimized for iPhone X / 8 / 7, and Built-in DAC(digital/analog decoder) 24bit/48KHz original digital signal replaces the traditional analog sound source which can realize the lossless HIFI digital signal and transmit wonderful HiFi natural sound.

The XR1 with Lightning Connector also include a built-in remote that lets you adjust the volume, control the playback of music and video, and answer or end calls with a touch of the cord.

* Made for iPhone, iPads (MFi approved)

entry.title: ORBIT True Wireless Stereo Speakers with Charging Dock
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rockstone
Type: Speakers
Price: 19.99

ORBIT by Rockstone Audio offers you the latest audio technology with left and right stereo sound for a comfortable listening experience. We have made sure to use the highest quality material to provide you with a stylish, durable, portable and lightweight speaker. You can rest assured that the ultra-loud 3W speaker is protected by the heavy-duty aluminum body. With Dual microphone in the speakers, you will never miss a call when your phone is out of reach as you can receive calls from the speaker itself. For your convenience, we have included a charging dock so you can charge both your speakers at the same time.
Features:
Upto 3 hours playtime
True wireless stereo 
Frequency Response: 20HZ-20KHZ
Total Harmonic Distortion: <1%
Signal-to-noise Ratio: 80DB
Speaker Parameter: 6W (3W each)
Diameter: 36mm
Battery Size (each): 3.7V/400mAh
Bluetooth Version: V4.2
Product Weight: 70g
Package Content: 2 Speakers, 1 Base and Micro USB Cable.
